title: Graphic Organizer Strategies for Medical Education: Comparative Study of Learning-by-Doing vs. Learning-by-Watching

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Requires mobile-optimized content enabling workplace learning. Design of smartphone-based learning activities for environments without PC access

learning_goals: Learners achieve scores of 80% or higher in knowledge retention tests conducted one month later
Learners achieve 3 out of 4 points or higher on a structured thinking assessment rubric when creating graphic organizers
Learners can comparatively analyze preferences and effectiveness between two teaching methods (learning-by-doing vs. learning-by-viewing)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
